title: Morning Breakfast
info: Breakfast is often called 'the most important meal of the day', and for good reason. Breakfast breaks the overnight fasting period.

title: Before Lunch Snack
info: Provides a boost of energy if several hours pass between meals and blood glucose levels drop. Prevent overeating next meal.

title: Lunch
info: Eating lunch raises your blood sugar level in the middle of the day, which gives you the energy you need for the rest of the day.

title: Noon Snack
info: Having a snack is good for the metabolism, but taking a break from work is good for the brain.

title: Evening Snack
info: It reduces the gap between lunch and dinner. It aids in sustaining energy until dinner time.

title: Dinner
info: Dinner is an important meal. Having a healthy dinner is linked to good sleep.
